name: Outro
_source: speak;;You completed the map in 20 or less turns! You got the full reward!;;;hint
speak;Alice;Hmmm...I still can't get over that annoying little girl who looks like me.
speak;Reimu;Plenty of people look like each other.
speak;Alice;Yeah, but I'm getting a feeling...like we're kindred.
speak;Reimu;Maybe it's because you're both magicians?
speak;Alice;Don't think that's it...well, no use on dwelling on it now.
speak;Kasen;She seemed to retreat that-a-way. Which is...towards the Barrier of Life and Death.
speak;Reimu;They're headed towards Hakugyokurou, it seems.
speak;Reimu;Tsk. We're gonna have to double our pace.
speak;Kasen;No time like the present then. Let's move out!
speak;Kasen;I don't know who you are, but I would be lying if I said that I trusted you.
speak;Mima;Is that so? Your wounds hurt me, but I suppose it's understandable.
speak;Kasen;Just keep yourself out of trouble.
speak;Mima;*sigh*, it's so hard to gain trust around here.
